question.title: Minimum Path Cost in a Hidden Grid
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Robot Room Cleaner", "titleSlug": "robot-room-cleaner", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Shortest Path in a Hidden Grid", "titleSlug": "shortest-path-in-a-hidden-grid", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: The grid is at a maximum 100 x 100, so it is clever to assume that the robot's initial cell is grid[101][101]
Run a DFS from the robot's position to make sure that you can reach the target, otherwise you should return -1.
Now that you are sure you can reach the target and that you know the grid, run Dijkstra to find the minimum cost.
